events.comment: Hi! I'm Manu and this is my example about the settings menu, is pretty simple: we will create a platformer game and then we will manage the settings in the game using the global variables. Hope you enjoy!
First, we need to create some global variables, one for each setting we want to add, so go in the section of the Global variables and check!
Here we need configure the UI using this events:
Now we're done with this scene, let's configure our platformer game!
You can create a simple game with these events:
Now let's use our Global variables to manage the game sounds
Here we go! Now you can reproduce this example in your game!
